Specimen Type: Patient specimen for DNA extraction (e.g., whole blood)
Purpose: To identify gene mutations linked to fatty acid oxidation disorders using next-generation sequencing.
Container: Not specified in SOP (typically an EDTA blood tube)
Equipment: Sequencing instrument (Illumina MiSeq or NovaSeq), DNA quantifier (Qubit/NanoDrop), thermocycler, NGS library prep kits, bioinformatics software
